Question: Blink Tech Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Blink Tech Inc.

Product: Smart and rotatable phone mount with AI app

- Transforms mobile phones into fully automated cameramen
- Utilizes AI and computer vision for automated recording and live streaming
- Supports sports game recording and live streaming
- Cloud upload with data analytics functionalities
- Suitable for capturing various life moments effortlessly
- Founded by passionate tech entrepreneurs and industry veterans
- Actively building sales channels in the U.S. and internationally

For more information and purchasing, visit www.blinktech.us
